page.topic: How to Create Your Own UX Component Template
page.description: You can create your own templates for the UX Component.

step.description: Open the UX Builder and create a UX Component (or open an existing UX Component.) Define as many or as few properties of the UX Component as you want.
From the *[ui:File]* menu, select *[ui:Save as template...]*

Specify the name and a description of your template. The name must be unique. The description describes the template. It is also displayed in the popup *[ui:Help]* dialog that is displayed when a new UX Component is created from a template.
Specify where the template should be stored. Depending on where you store the template, it will be available in one of the following locations:

item.name: Local template
item.description: Template is only available for the current Web Project.

item.name: Project template
item.description: Template is available to any Web Project in the current Alpha Anywhere Workspace.

item.name: Global template
item.description: Template is available in all Web Projects in every Workspace.
